description: Unique identifier of the SSIS integration record (project/package) within the ETL catalog, used to reference configuration, deployments, and executions for fleet data pipelines.
Indicator showing whether the SSIS project/package is currently deployed to the target environment and available for scheduling or execution.
SSIS catalog folder that contains the project/package; organizes related ETL solutions for fleet data integration.
Name of the SSIS deployment file (.ispac) for the project containing packages that load or transform fleet data.
